name: Automatically Sync Shopify Order and Customer Details to Odoo

outputs.name: Convert country and state to Odoo ids

fields.description: Use this code to cross-reference in the Avalara portal.
fields.label: Avalara Code

fields.description: This field is used to search on email address as the primary email field can contain more than strictly an email address.
fields.label: Normalized Email

fields.description: If the email address is on the blacklist, the contact won't receive mass mailing anymore, from any list
fields.label: Blacklist

fields.description: All the emails and documents sent to this contact will be translated in this language.
fields.label: Language

fields.description:
When printing documents and exporting/importing data, time values are computed according to this timezone.
If the timezone is not set, UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) is used.
Anywhere else, time values are computed according to the time offset of your web client.
fields.label: Timezone

fields.description: The internal user in charge of this contact.
fields.label: Salesperson

fields.description: The Tax Identification Number. Values here will be validated based on the country format. You can use '/' to indicate that the partner is not subject to tax.
fields.label: Tax ID

fields.description: The registry number of the company. Use it if it is different from the Tax ID. It must be unique across all partners of a same country
fields.label: Company ID

fields.description: Check this box if this contact is an Employee.
fields.label: Employee

fields.description:
The ISO country code in two chars. 
You can use this field for quick search.
fields.label: Country Code

fields.description: Format email address "Name <email@domain>"
fields.label: Formatted Email

fields.description: Check if the contact is a company, otherwise it is a person
fields.label: Is a Company

fields.description: Either customer (not a user), either shared user. Indicated the current partner is a customer without access or with a limited access created for sharing data.
fields.label: Share Partner

fields.description: Use a barcode to identify this contact.
fields.label: Barcode
Last notification marked as read from base Calendar

fields.description: This pricelist will be used, instead of the default one, for sales to the current partner
fields.label: Pricelist

fields.description: Field used to store sanitized phone number. Helps speeding up searches and comparisons.
fields.label: Sanitized Number

fields.description: If the sanitized phone number is on the blacklist, the contact won't receive mass mailing sms anymore, from any list
fields.label: Phone Blacklisted

fields.description: Indicates if a blacklisted sanitized phone number is a phone number. Helps distinguish which number is blacklisted             when there is both a mobile and phone field in a model.
fields.label: Blacklisted Phone is Phone

fields.description: Indicates if a blacklisted sanitized phone number is a mobile number. Helps distinguish which number is blacklisted             when there is both a mobile and phone field in a model.
fields.label: Blacklisted Phone Is Mobile

fields.description: Used for sending notification to registered devices
fields.label: OCN Token

fields.description: Total amount this customer owes you.
fields.label: Total Receivable

fields.description: Credit limit specific to this partner.
fields.label: Credit Limit

fields.description: [(Total Receivable/Total Revenue) * number of days since the first invoice] for this customer
fields.label: Days Sales Outstanding (DSO)

fields.description: Total amount you have to pay to this vendor.
fields.label: Total Payable

fields.description: This account will be used instead of the default one as the payable account for the current partner
fields.label: Account Payable

fields.description: This account will be used instead of the default one as the receivable account for the current partner
fields.label: Account Receivable

fields.description: The fiscal position determines the taxes/accounts used for this contact.
fields.label: Fiscal Position

fields.description: This payment term will be used instead of the default one for sales orders and customer invoices
fields.label: Customer Payment Terms

fields.description: This payment term will be used instead of the default one for purchase orders and vendor bills
fields.label: Vendor Payment Terms

fields.description: The partner has at least one unreconciled debit and credit since last time the invoices & payments matching was performed.
fields.label: Has Unreconciled Entries

fields.description: Last time the invoices & payments matching was performed for this partner. It is set either if there's not at least an unreconciled debit and an unreconciled credit or if you click the "Done" button.
fields.label: Latest Invoices & Payments Matching Date
Degree of trust you have in this debtor

fields.description: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.
fields.label: Invoice

fields.description: Preferred payment method when paying this vendor. This is used to filter vendor bills by preferred payment method to register payments in mass. Use cases: create bank files for batch wires, check runs.
fields.label: Payment Method

fields.description: Unique identifier used by the BIS Billing 3.0 and its derivatives, also known as 'Endpoint ID'.
fields.label: Peppol Endpoint

fields.description:
Code used to identify the Endpoint for BIS Billing 3.0 and its derivatives.
             List available at https://docs.peppol.eu/poacc/billing/3.0/codelist/eas/
fields.label: Peppol e-address (EAS)

options.label: 0002 - System Information et Repertoire des Entreprise et des Etablissements: SIRENE
0096 - DANISH CHAMBER OF COMMERCE Scheme (EDIRA compliant)
0106 - Association of Chambers of Commerce and Industry in the Netherlands, (EDIRA compliant)
0188 - Corporate Number of The Social Security and Tax Number System
0191 - Centre of Registers and Information Systems of the Ministry of Justice
0196 - Kennitala - Iceland legal id for individuals and legal entities
0221 - The registered number of the qualified invoice issuer (Japan)
9918 - SOCIETY FOR WORLDWIDE INTERBANK FINANCIAL, TELECOMMUNICATION S.W.I.F.T
9942 - Macedonia, the former Yugoslav Republic of VAT number
9953 - Holy See (Vatican City State) VAT number

fields.description: Customer Code set in Avalara for this partner.
fields.label: Avalara Partner Code

fields.description:
The date before which no follow-up action should be taken.
                You can set it manually if desired but it is automatically set when follow-ups are processed.
                The date is computed according to the following rules (depending on the follow-up levels):
                - default -> next date set in {next level delay - current level delay} days
                - if no next level -> next date set in {current level delay - previous level delay} days
                - if no next level AND no previous level -> next date set in {current level delay} days
                - if no level defined at all -> next date never automatically set
fields.label: Next reminder

fields.description: The responsible assigned to manual followup activities, if defined in the level.
fields.label: Responsible

fields.description: Journal items of this vendor will be summed in the selected box of the 1099 report.
fields.label: 1099 Box

fields.description: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.
fields.label: Sales Warnings

fields.label: Avalara Partner Code

fields.description:
The date before which no follow-up action should be taken.
                You can set it manually if desired but it is automatically set when follow-ups are processed.
                The date is computed according to the following rules (depending on the follow-up levels):
                - default -> next date set in {next level delay - current level delay} days
                - if no next level -> next date set in {current level delay - previous level delay} days
                - if no next level AND no previous level -> next date set in {current level delay} days
                - if no level defined at all -> next date never automatically set

outputs.name: Get the created or existing customer

fields.description:
Creation date of draft/sent orders,
Confirmation date of confirmed orders.
fields.label: Order Date

fields.description: This is a name that helps you keep track of your different campaign efforts, e.g. Fall_Drive, Christmas_Special
fields.label: Campaign

fields.description: This is the source of the link, e.g. Search Engine, another domain, or name of email list
fields.label: Source

fields.description: This is the method of delivery, e.g. Postcard, Email, or Banner Ad
fields.label: Medium

fields.description: Customer Portal URL
fields.label: Portal Access URL

fields.description: Locked orders cannot be modified.
fields.label: Locked

fields.description: This is the delivery date promised to the customer. If set, the delivery order will be scheduled based on this date rather than product lead times.
fields.label: Delivery Date

fields.description: Reference of the document that generated this sales order request
fields.label: Source Document

fields.description: The payment communication of this sale order.
fields.label: Payment Ref.

fields.description: Request a online signature from the customer to confirm the order.
fields.label: Online signature

fields.description: Request a online payment from the customer to confirm the order.
fields.label: Online payment

fields.description: The percentage of the amount needed that must be paid by the customer to confirm the order.
fields.label: Prepayment percentage

fields.description: Validity of the order, after that you will not able to sign & pay the quotation.
fields.label: Expiration

fields.description: If set, the SO will invoice in this journal; otherwise the sales journal with the lowest sequence is used.
fields.label: Invoicing Journal

fields.description: Fiscal positions are used to adapt taxes and accounts for particular customers or sales orders/invoices.The default value comes from the customer.
fields.label: Fiscal Position

fields.x-typeahead-domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'parent_of', [company_id])] or ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'parent_of', [''])]) + (['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=', company_id)])
fields.label: Payment Terms

fields.description: If you change the pricelist, only newly added lines will be affected.
fields.x-typeahead-domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'in', [company_id])] or [('company_id', '=', False)]) + (['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=', company_id)])
fields.label: Pricelist

fields.x-typeahead-domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'in', [company_id])] or [('company_id', '=', False)]) + (['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=', company_id)])
fields.label: Sales Team

fields.description: Sum of transactions made in through the online payment form that are in the state 'done' or 'authorized' and linked to this order.
fields.label: Payment Transactions Amount

fields.x-typeahead-domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'in', [company_id])] or [('company_id', '=', False)]) + (['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=', company_id)])
fields.label: Analytic Account

fields.description:
The ISO country code in two chars. 
You can use this field for quick search.
fields.label: Country code

fields.description: Delivery date you can promise to the customer, computed from the minimum lead time of the order lines.
fields.label: Expected Date

options.label: Add a link to a Web Page

fields.description: The template of the pending email that must be sent asynchronously.
fields.label: Pending Email Template

fields.x-typeahead-domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'in', [company_id])] or [('company_id', '=', False)]) + ([('type', '=', 'opportunity'), '|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=', company_id)])
fields.label: Opportunity

fields.description: Technical field to determine if tax is calculated using an external service instead of Odoo.
fields.label: Is Tax Computed Externally

fields.x-typeahead-domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'in', [company_id])] or [('company_id', '=', False)]) + (['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=', company_id)])
fields.label: Quotation Template

fields.description: Use this code to cross-reference in the Avalara portal.
fields.label: Avalara Code

fields.description: Number of days between the order confirmation and the shipping of the products to the customer
fields.label: Lead Time

fields.description: Down payments are made when creating invoices from a sales order. They are not copied when duplicating a sales order.
fields.label: Is a down payment

fields.description: Is true if the sales order line comes from an expense or a vendor bills
fields.label: Is expense

fields.description: Conversion between Units of Measure can only occur if they belong to the same category. The conversion will be made based on the ratios.
fields.label: Category

fields.description:
According to product configuration, the delivered quantity can be automatically computed by mechanism:
  - Manual: the quantity is set manually on the line
  - Analytic From expenses: the quantity is the quantity sum from posted expenses
  - Timesheet: the quantity is the sum of hours recorded on tasks linked to this sale line
  - Stock Moves: the quantity comes from confirmed pickings
fields.label: Method to update delivered qty

fields.description:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.
fields.label: Product Type
